sentences.sentence: Sadly, bamboo plants die after flowering.
sentences.translation: 令人遗憾的是，竹子开花后就会死亡。

sentences.sentence: Sadly, both he and my mother died of cancer.
sentences.translation: 令人悲伤的是，他和我母亲都死于癌症。

sentences.sentence: Sadly when the lid of the boot sprang open, it was empty.
sentences.translation: 可惜，当后备箱盖弹开时，里面是空的。
